pages.text: Though many like to write them off as grotesque, toads are rumored to have healing

properties.$(2br)Their remains are valuable in both brewing and some more gruesome divination, and swamp witches often use them as alarms.  When the cicadas and toads fall silent, something is approaching.$(br2)Toads can be surprisingly smart, and have a kind of sixth sense when it comes to herbal magic.  Druids of old apparently asked toads for advice on brewing, and the things they were taught lead
to the alchemy we see today.$(br2)$(o)You really shouldn't kiss them.
